PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Warehouse No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 4 R Enter Warehouse # or (ALL)
Enter Customer No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 8 R Enter a valid customer number or (ALL)
Enter Starting Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 6 R Enter a valid period (YYYYPP)
Enter Ending Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 6 R Enter a valid period (YYYYPP)
Enter Starting Receipt Date or (ALL) DropDown PPDField05 6 8 R Enter a receiving date or (ALL) H ALL ALL
Enter Ending Receipt Date or (ALL) DropDown PPDField06 6 8 R Enter a receiving date or (ALL) H ALL ALL
Enter Option (S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField07 1 1 R Enter a valid option (S), (D) H S,D (SUMMARY),(DETAIL)
